text: Martijn Bok (born 8 March 1973) is a retired Dutch tennis player. Bok has a career high ATP singles ranking of 212 achieved on 22 May 1995. He also has a career high doubles ranking of 204 achieved on 16 October 1995. Bok has won 1 ATP Challenger doubles title at the 1995 Seville Challenger.https://www.itftennis.com/ProCircuit/players/player/profile.aspx?PlayerID=10005712 Bok is the current coach of Petra Martić, tennis professional from Croatia. ==Tour titles== {| class=wikitable !
